name: SciVi-FSGraph
description: Simple graph visualization module of SciVi

scripts.debug: rm -r ./tmp && tsc -p jsconfig.json && webpack --mode development && cp dist/bundle.js ../demo/fsgraph/lib/scivi-fsgraph.min.js
scripts.debug_win: del /q /s tmp && tsc -p jsconfig.json && webpack --mode development && copy /y dist\bundle.js ..\demo\fsgraph\lib\scivi-fsgraph.min.js
scripts.release: tsc -p jsconfig.json && webpack --mode production && cp dist/bundle.js ../demo/fsgraph/lib/scivi-fsgraph.min.js
